attributes.action: Lower the price of Fuel in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
The Government needs to step in on behalf of the British Public to cap the prices of fuel to help combat the cost of living crisis. 

The working public should not have to choose between heating their home, eating a meal or putting fuel in their cars to get to work.
attributes.background:
The price of fuel in the UK has never really dropped to an affordable level since it was increased in 2021.

BP and Shell have flaunted record breaking profits while residents in the UK are choosing whether to put the heating on or eat.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622530
